channel.title: How do i make a register system to log in my server?
channel.description:
hey i was wondering if the wonderful people of moparscape can help me??
how do i make it so you need to register on my website or w.e before you may log in???
help me plz!

It tells me to make a new server and when I do, it doesn’t work!

Please help!
